==== lateBoundAssignmentDeclarationSupport1.js (0 errors) ====
    // currently unsupported
    const _sym = Symbol();
    const _str = "my-fake-sym";
    
    exports[_sym] = "ok";
    exports[_str] = "ok";
    exports.S = _sym;
